meta.track_condition: Dirt: Fast | Turf: Firm | Tapeta: Fast

selections.name: Resort (fr)
selections.reason: Top connections (Pletcher/Gaffalione) and strong recent form (Speed 107). Finished 2nd in a similar MSW last out.

selections.name: Blazing Bridgette
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 103 speed figure. Finished 2nd in MOC last time out.

selections.name: Eternal Mandate
selections.reason: Highest speed figure (110) in the field. Casse/Irad combination is lethal (28%).

selections.name: Role Play
selections.reason: Showed promise in debut at Woodbine. Saez aboard suggests intent.

danger_horse.name: Eternal Mandate
danger_horse.reason: Possesses the raw speed to clear the field if the break is sharp.

selections.name: Message Of Hope (ire)
selections.reason: Dominant speed figure (111) and won last out on this surface. Irad/D'Angelo combo strikes at 13%.

selections.name: Governing Party
selections.reason: Maker/Gaffalione team. Speed 109 fits well here. Consistent mid-pack stalker.

selections.name: Power From Above
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last out with a 106 speed figure. Bravo aboard.

selections.name: Mr. Colossal
selections.reason: Deep closer who could pick up pieces if pace collapses.

selections.name: Awesome Beast
selections.reason: Fastest recent speed figure (108). Should control pace or sit just off.

selections.name: Volatiled
selections.reason: Irad Ortiz takes the mount. Classy runner dropping into a winnable spot.

selections.reason: Solid speed (105) and gets Gaffalione. Inside draw aids early position.
